entries.description: [CodeWhisperer]: Introducing "Stop code scan" feature where users will be able to stop the ongoing code scan and immediately start a new one.
Attempt to download IDE thin client earlier in the CodeCatalyst Dev Environment connection process
[CodeWhisperer]: New supported programming languages: C, C++, Go, Kotlin, Php, Ruby, Rust, Scala, Shell, Sql.
Include more information in the Dev Environment status tooltip
Provide consistent UX in all Dev Environment wizard variants
Fix 'MissingResourceException: Registry key is not defined'
[CodeWhisperer]: Multiple bug fixes to improve user experience
Drop support for the Node.js 12.x Lambda runtime
Drop support for the .NET Core 3.1 Lambda runtime
